name: Arcstone
flavorText: Robbers plundering an ancient tomb near Westmarch discovered forty-two skeletons laid out in repose, each wearing one of these rings. Their origins and creators have been lost to the ages, but the Arcstone rings have returned.
flavorTextHtml: Robbers plundering an ancient tomb near Westmarch discovered forty-two skeletons laid out in repose, each wearing one of these rings. Their origins and creators have been lost to the ages, but the Arcstone rings have returned.

secondary.textHtml: Lightning pulses periodically between all wearers of this item, dealing 1350% weapon damage. [1000 - 1500]%
